Summary: Star like thing drawing other smaller stars into it and then disappearing.
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout eight weeks ago, as I was walking from my car, up the back driveway, to the hotel I work the graveyard shift at, I started noticing a number of lights in the sky encircleing our Big Island of Hawaii. They were all at the same height, all the same brightness and spaced evenly apart. I thought they might be satellites protecting us from any incoming missles. Sort of like an umbrella. OK with me I thought. Then, about two weeks ago there appeared a bright star-like object out over the ocean. I thought it could possibly be two satellites, one behind the other. It was a little higher in the sky then the "umbrella lights". Last week on my way into work I noticed that the bright star-like object was even brighter. As I was watching this thing get brighter, a cigar-shaped object with red lights approached the bright star-like object and shot a beam of light down on it, just like a tractor beam from a science fiction movie. Then the red-lighted object blinked out of sight. The bright star-like object dimmed but remained. Well, then tonight the bright star-like object got brighter again and one by one the umbrella satellite objects blinked out as they progressed closer to the bright star-like object. The bright star-like object then looked as if it were receeding away from where it was and as if someone gave a command to go to warp speed, it was gone. In the end there were no more lit objects that had originally caught my attention. No umbrella satellites, no red cigar-shaped object and no more bright star-like object, just black empty space. I felt releived, but angry that other people missed the whole thing.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Waikoloa Village
There were no other sightings in Waikoloa Village on or around September 3rd 2010
